name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Frontend Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in high-performance application development. Expertise in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Vue.js**, and building **RESTful APIs** to deliver scalable, maintainable, and optimized solutions. Proficient in applying **CI/CD** practices, component-based architecture, and frontend testing strategies to enhance project quality and deployment speed.
Strong focus on performance optimization, accessibility, responsiveness, and usability, ensuring end-user satisfaction across complex applications. Adept at working in **Unix environments** and maintaining code integrity with **version control** practices.
Demonstrated organizational and communication skills, effectively managing stakeholder expectations while driving project success. Additionally, I bring valuable experience from the healthcare and financial sectors, enabling compliance-driven development aligned with industry standards.
